contents.text: Welcome to Fivestars, San Francisco’s leading loyalty and rewards platform for local businesses.
For sales and partnership opportunities, please press '1'.
To speak with a sales representative, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: I need to speak with a sales rep to discuss partnership opportunities and pricing.
I run a veteran-owned small business and want to discuss partnership opportunities with Fivestars.
Connect me to a sales rep to discuss API integration options and partnership pricing.
I want information on partnering with Fivestars for my local store.
I’d like to explore partnering my student-run coffee kiosk with Fivestars.

contents.text: To request a product demo, press '2'.
Please hold while we transfer you to a demo specialist.

navigationGoals: I’d like to schedule a demo of your loyalty and rewards platform.
I’d like to schedule a hands-on demo of the Fivestars loyalty platform for my veteran-led store.
Set up a product demo to explore the platform's feature set and REST API workflows.
I’d like to schedule a demonstration of how Fivestars works.
I want to schedule a walkthrough of the platform for my campus bookstore team.

contents.text: For technical support or questions about your rewards program, please press '2'.
For questions about your rewards program account, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you with a rewards specialist.

navigationGoals: I need help reviewing my rewards points balance and redemption options.
I need help checking my Fivestars rewards point balance and recent redemptions.
I need to review my rewards account's transaction log and current point balance.
I need to update my email address on my rewards account.
I need to clarify how my current reward points are applied and when they expire.

contents.text: For technical assistance or troubleshooting, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I’m having trouble logging into my account and need technical support.
I’m having trouble logging into the Fivestars app and need technical assistance.
Help me troubleshoot an API authentication error in the mobile SDK.
I’m having login trouble and need help resetting my password.
I’m having trouble integrating Fivestars with our POS system and need technical assistance.
